name: Keyword search (live) (logical)
description: Searching for keywords over the raw data, without an index of text content, but on a file by file basis
details: This approach can include decoding the individual file formats and content. It can also overcome limitations associated with compressed data or data split due to file fragmentation.
references: NIST, 2025. Computer forensics tools & techniques catalog: string search, https://toolcatalog.nist.gov/taxonomy/index.php?ff_id=31
X-Ways (2025), X-Ways Manual: Logical Search (section 5.11), https://www.x-ways.net/winhex/manual.pdf
